artist: Artist: Dyani White Hawk; Printer: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis; Publisher: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis
creditline: Highpoint Editions Archive, The Friends of Bruce B. Dayton Acquisition Fund and the Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: Screenprint with applied bronze, silver, and pearl foils in 25 colors from stencils produced using drawings made by the artist referencing Lakota dentalium yoked dresses. The dress color is predominately red and is one of four related works from the artist's "Take Care of Them" suite.

provenance: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis (publisher); sold to MIA, 2020.
